reviewText:
I am really dissapointed to strongly advice AGAINST buying this

This is on my top 5 favorite games of all time/platforms/genres
It trully is a masterpiece as a whole and in my opinion a true work of art but...

This is NOT the original but a port from touch devices with no cutscenes, funky control and many more flaws
Those of you unlucky enough like myself, to purchase and play dracula trilogy from steam having played the pc originals know exactly what I am talking about. It is a cheap port for hit and run money of a great franchise with no effort of restoring or respecting the originals whatsoever

Take my advice and do not ruin this wonderful experience by playing this crippled version and do yourself the favor of playing the pc original

It trully is a magical journey, but this is like the trailer highlights, minus the core world escense and natural magic of Atlantis, the way its artists created it to be enjoyed

reviewText:
Apparently this is a very bad mobile port.

Graphics are AWFUL.

All puzzles and challenges removed.

If I had known this, I wouldn't have even taken this game for free, let alone the 10 dollars I wasted.

reviewText:
I still own the original CD version. I bought this expecting not to use the CDs anymore. BUT surprise surprise this version is awful, they removed all of the puzzles makin this game zero challenging.

I am very disapointed of the devs or publishers of this version.
If you can, try to get the original CD version It's waaaaaaaaaaay better

reviewText: After 15 years still one of the most beautiful games in scenery and music I have ever played. Too bad it is missing it's puzzles, but without them I still needed 7 hours to finish it.\nHopefully the other games in the series will also be released on Steam, especially The Lost Tales, which makes the story easier to understand if your new to the series.

reviewText: i played that game when i was little, and i loved it. when it came on steam it made me so happy to see it again. the game is old but have a very good story and the most beautyful music. its very orginal and have a very long game play.\n13/10

reviewText: I was able to play this game years ago when I was a boy. Although I never figured out the puzzles then, I was able to now. There are some things that were changed in the version I bought than the one that was on the disk. There were less sequences and some of the puzzles solved itself. The icons on which you clicked to engage the item was a target and it was like playing google street view. But In summary it was a very satisfying game and closed one more chapter in my childhood. I would recemmend it if it wasn't too short ( Beat it 3 hours.). But it was a good game indeed. My favorite thing about this game was the soundtrack. 10/10 would listen.
voteText: 2 of 2 people (100%) found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText: As a kid I played the first game of this Atlantis-series, so I was curious to see if part 2 could live up to my expectations. It didn't...\nThe game has a nice storyline and the animation in between is interesting too. The video-quality is pretty good for a game that old. Besides that, the game lacks difficulty. There are basically no puzzles (or they solve themselves) which takes away the most interesting part for me. I've read in other reviews that the game has been altered a lot compared to the original game, so I guess it once was a good game, but now it's not anymore. Disappointed...
voteText: 2 of 2 people (100%) found this review helpful

reviewText: THis game has bugs and crashes, and many of the puzzles in the original version are missing.  Half the fun is gone!

This was a great game when it first came out.  All of the major puzzles in the original that made this game fun as well as some of the cutscenes have been removed and only the bare bones of the game remain with these puzzles auto completed.  Though the story overall remains I wouldn't recommend.
I would only recommend this game if you are simply playing it to relive memories from the original game. This is some kind of import, some puzzles are missing.

reviewText:
So here we go, after playing 2 hours of the steam version.

It's a pretty classic adventure game. We have to keep in mind that this is old.
The graphics are not the best but still enjoyable.

There is a good atmosphere and good puzzles.

Advice: worth the discount
